answers.answer: thankfully syphilis is easily treated with penicillin. we typically don't recommend much in the way of follow up testing after treatment.no reason to think you contracted syphilis again from oral sex.grace
ok why about can you find out that i had syphilis in my blood even if i get tested for any other regular blood tests?

question: i was infected in March of this year with syphilis and doc diagnosed me secondary stage and got treated with three penicillin shots. i was fine when i went back to the doctor in June and doctor said the titers would take time to go down and also doc said i wasn't contagious. two weeks ago i received oral sex and rimming job from this guy and two weeks after i am anxious about recurring of the syphilis. i see a tiny white pimple on the bottom back of my penis. i am scare! should i go to the ER and get checked up for this? and also another question , do you think even after the successful treatment syphilis stays with in the body and even if i get tested for other blood check ups such as for diabetes or blood pressure, anyone could find out that i was infected with the syphilis in my life? is that true?
title: syphilis related!
